title: Ticket #3980: schedd per-user statistics should be at verbosity 2, not 1
description: When per-user schedd statistics are enabled using SCHEDD_COLLECT_STATS_FOR_xxx or SCHEDD_COLLECT_STATS_BY_xxx, the schedd add can grow enormously. To help prevent this, it should be possible to config the STATISTICS_TO_PUBLISH to SCHEDD:1 and get the overall stats but not the per-user stats.
